title: Mermaid Avenue, Maroubra
content:
The goal was to design a modern, highly functional home that embraced the relaxed feel of coastal living while meeting the dynamic needs of a young family. The home needed to feel open and airy, encourage connection through shared spaces, and offer practical features that support everyday life, all with a calm, beach-inspired aesthetic.

To bring this vision to life, the design team focused on simplicity, flow, and functionality, with thoughtful coastal touches throughout.

Open-Plan Living: Areas were created to maximise natural light and take full advantage of expansive ocean views. Large windows and sliding glass doors blur the line between indoor and outdoor living, encouraging a laid-back beachside lifestyle.

Sleek Kitchen: A sleek kitchen was designed as the heart of the home, with its crisp white cabinetry, integrated appliances, and plenty of storage to keep daily life organised and clutter-free.

Neutral-Toned Bathrooms: The bathrooms were kept neutral and calming, featuring contemporary fixtures and minimalist detailing, making them feel fresh, clean, and timeless.

Warm Timber Flooring: Warm timber flooring was used throughout the home to tie each space together, adding texture, warmth, and a natural element that complements the coastal palette.

The end result is a stylish and practical home that’s easy to live in. It’s bright, open, and welcoming, perfect for family life and also a great place to relax. Every part of the home was carefully planned to suit its costal location, while still giving a growing family the modern layout and comforts they need. It’s coastal living made easy- simple, smart and super comfy.
